name: hautnah_dc
description: An own discord bot for hautnah.

scripts.prod: pm2 start shard.js --name hautnah. --max-memory-restart 500M && pm2 monit
scripts.restart: pm2 stop hautnah. && pm2 start shard.js --name hautnah. --max-memory-restart 500M && pm2 monit
scripts.kill: pm2 stop hautnah. && pm2 delete hautnah.

author: BlackDayz
